UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

SyllabusProgress.title: Syllabus Progress
SyllabusProgress.description: Tracks the completed syllabus topics for a user.

completedTopics.description: A list of completed topic IDs.

MockTest.title: Mock Test
MockTest.description: Represents a single mock test record for a user.

name.description: The name or description of the mock test.

syllabus.description: The syllabus covered in the mock test.

score.description: The score obtained by the user in the mock test.

PomodoroProgress.title: Pomodoro Progress
PomodoroProgress.description: Tracks the number of pomodoro sessions completed by a user.

StudyMaterial.title: Study Material
StudyMaterial.description: Contains links to study materials for a specific topic.

lectureUrl.description: YouTube video URL for the lecture.

notesUrl.description: Google Drive link for class notes.

questionBankUrl.description: Google Drive link for the question bank.

shortNoteUrl.description: Google Drive link for short notes.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/users/{userId}/progress/syllabus.description: Stores the syllabus progress for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/mockTests/{testId}.description: Stores individual mock test records for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/progress/pomodoro.description: Stores the user's daily pomodoro session counts.

/studyMaterials/{subjectId}/topics/{topi.description: Stores study material links for a given subject and topic.
